name: 2021 The 5th International Conference on Building Materials and Materials Engineering
content: Publication: Submitted conference papers will be blind peer reviewed by competent reviewers. The accepted and registered papers will be published in Materials Science Forum, (ISSN print 0255-5476 / ISSN web 1662-9752) which is indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), REAXYS, Chimica, etc. Special Issue (SCIE Journal): Selected registered abstract/paper can be recommended for potential publication in Buildings (ISSN 2075-5309). Indexing: Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), Inspec, and other databases Special Issue "Emerging Challenges for Building Materials and Systems"
